entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbrid ge gave a very tiny cough, as though she was trying to see how quietly she could do it.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall ignored her. Professor McGonagall closed her eyes for a moment, opened them again, and continued as though nothing had happened.

entities.name: defense against the dark arts
entities.description: You’ll want to know which subjects you ought to take, I suppose? ‘Naturally,’ said Professor McGo nagall crisply. ‘I would also advise —’

entities.name: transfiguration
entities.description: I would also advise Transfiguration, because Aurors frequently need to Transfigure or Untransfigure in their work.

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: And I ought to tell you now, Potter, that I do not a ccept students into my N.E.W.T. because Aurors frequently need to Transfigure or Untransfigure in their work.

entities.name: n.e.w.t.
entities.description: And I ought to tell you now, Potter, that I do not a ccept students into my N.E.W.T.

You’ll want to know which subjects you ought to take, I suppose? ‘Naturally,’ said Professor McGo nagall crisply. ‘I would also advise —’
I would also advise Transfiguration, because Aurors frequently need to Transfigure or Untransfigure in their work.
And I ought to tell you now, Potter, that I do not a ccept students into my N.E.W.T. because Aurors frequently need to Transfigure or Untransfigure in their work.
